name: 2022 4th International Conference on Control and Robotics（ICCR 2022）
content: Paper Publication: Submitted Papers to the conference will be subjected to the rigorous peer-review process. For accepted papers, it will be published in the ICCR 2022 Conference Proceedings, which will be published and submitted to IEEE Xplore. Those papers will be indexed by Ei Compendex, Scopus and other main databases.
